summary: BuildRequest contains no requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff adds a blob-storage mixin to the Motoko backend and updates project_state.json metadata, which are not requested by any stated requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Added blob storage mixin integration in the Motoko backend actor via `include MixinStorage()`.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so adding backend storage functionality is not traceable to any requested change.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/maintained project metadata describing features (project_state.json changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided; changes to project state/feature catalog are not requested deliverables.
